title: Redout 2
notes: Epic achievements working. Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. Install C++ Runtime Install
description: The fastest racing game in the universe. Redout 2 is a tribute to classic arcade racing games and the sequel to the critically acclaimed Redout. Reach impossible speeds in exhilarating futuristic races across an extensive single-player campaign and competitive multiplayer.
